name: Experiencing Saigon in the different way: selling lottery tickets, family lunch & becoming a barista
description: You do not know what will happen tomorrow, so live for today. This is the way I enjoy and experience my Saigon, total different from others. Take a look around, you will understand another ones, you know other sides of Saigon. I call it "life" instead of "traveling". Life is all about experiencing. Just enjoy it!
